product_name: Thule Pack n' Pedal Trunk Bag
long_description: Compact and waterproof, the Thule Pack 'n Pedal Basic Trunk Bag mounts to any front or rear bike rack and offers 11 liters of storage to protect important items from the weather while you ride. Thule Pack 'n Pedal Basic Trunk Bag features a waterproof, roll-top design to keep contents dry. Exterior translucent pockets allow safety light to be used and stored in one convenient location (safety light not included). Simple rip-and-stick attachments provide secure rack mounting and quick installation and removal. Roll-top closure doubles as a convenient carrying handle. This trunk bag works best with the Thule Pack n' Pedal Tour Rack and fits perfectly between 2 Thule panniers (sold separately); also compatable with any standard bike rack.
short_description: Compact and waterproof, the Thule Pack 'n Pedal Basic Trunk Bag mounts to any front or rear bike rack and offers 11 liters of storage to protect important items from the weather while you ride.
